{% extends "templates/end_page.html" %} {% set namespaces = "cmoon::meta" %} {% set library_name = "Metaprogramming" %} {% set item_name = "value_list" %} {% set end_name = "contains" %} {% set templates = "" %} {% block content2 %} {{macros.overload_set([ " template [[nodiscard]] static constexpr bool contains(const T& item) noexcept; " ])}}

Returns true if item is a value within this value_list, returns false otherwise.

{{macros.function_stats( ["item", "The value to find"], "true if item is a value within this value_list, false otherwise.", "This function never throws exceptions", "Linear (sizeof...(Values))" )}} {{macros.example_code( " import cmoon.meta; int main() { using vl = cmoon::meta::value_list<1, 3, 5, 7>; if constexpr (tl::contains(5)) { // It has a 5! } else { // It does not have a 5 :( } } " )}} {% endblock %}
